alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kahoolawe; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; South Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 14 at 3:03PM HST until November 15 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF MAUI AND HAWAII COUNTIES THROUGH WEDNESDAY... .Strong northeast trade winds will be especially gusty over and downwind of terrain. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Kahoolawe, Lanai, Maui, and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, and can knock down holiday decorations and tree branches. Strong gusts can make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for localized power outages. Consider postponing hiking in the mountains.
